articles.author: Kevin Yao
articles.title: Beijing imposes 14-day self-quarantine on returnees in bid to prevent spread of coronavirus - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Beijing imposes 14-day self-quarantine on returnees in bid to prevent spread of coronavirus The Globe and Mail China says more than 1,700 health workers infected in coronavirus outbreak CBC.ca Coronavirus: Senior Chinese officials 'removed' as death toll rise…
articles.content:
Workers in protective suits disinfect a commercial complex with sanitizing equipment, following an outbreak of the novel coronavirus, in Beijing's Sanlitun, China, on Feb. 13, 2020.
CHINA DAILY/Reuters
